entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
